fxInfo_clarification: Mode of election of the legislature. Refers only to the lower house.
fxInfo_notes: There were few observation coded as 2 or 3 and they have been collapsed with 1 in the data file. The original data do exist.

fxInfo_responses.value: Some voters vote directly, some indirectly, depending on individual characteristics.
Some voters vote directly, some indirectly, depending on collective characteristics (i.e. territory).

name: e_legdirect
